title: To the idiot
review: This is for the person that posted a 1 star because he thinks this was listed as a horror film. Well you dumb jerk it is not listed as a horror at all! It's listed on  as a thriller. THILLER!! Can you spell it for us? The movie wasn't bad at all. Really strong acting with a great script. Sorry to everyone else I am just tired of people bashing movies for reasons that make no sense.

title: Good storyline but not so good actors
review: The story was good, unexpected, but main character was kind of fake drama

title: Mummy's Secrets Out !
review:
Slow burn thriller that's compelling. Starts off, daughter coming of age gets visit from long lost mother. The father seems to have a hold over her.
You think is this one of those dead or not dead films, I wont give anything away you're just have to see how it plays out.
The ending reveals all the dirty secrets. Good Watch
